items.text: right behind the line as he defends
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: nice and full on off, he works this into the leg side
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: firm push down the ground, bisects mid-off and mid-on. Beautiful timing
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: firm push but can't pierce the gap at extra cover
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: steered down to square third man
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: uppish but doesn't carry, straight to cover point
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, no run

items.text: struck on the pad as he looks to whip this across the line. Big appeal but replays confirm ball pitched outside leg
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short-arm jab to midwicket
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, no run

items.text: easy pickings, width and right in the slot for the cover drive. Beautifully done
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: goes right back and across as he defends
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, no run

items.text: works this off his wrists into the gap behind square
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, 3 runs

items.text: wrists this length ball to midwicket
items.postText: Time for a switch. Sreshth is in
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length, just outside off, and fended away to the off side. Played with the bat's open face
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full, just outside off, and the attempted leg-side clip takes a leading edge to cover
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, no run

items.text: peach! Full, just outside off and the attempted front-foot defense misses the ball. Whizzes past his outside edge
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full, on leg and it hits his pads while trying to flick. Rolls away to the leg side and they scamper across for one. Umpire reckons it came off his bat
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full toss from around the wicket, but too wide outside off. Driven through the covers, but a fielder gets his hand to it
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full, on off, and defended off the front foot to cover
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, no run

items.text: yorker on leg stump, but flicked off his ankles to the backward-square boundary. Adair's diving effort not good enough
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on middle, and fended off the back foot
items.postText: Abdul Bashet: "Singles singles singles, BD batsmens please take singles; Do not wait for only boundaries!"
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: exquisite! Full, just outside off and he leans forward to drive through the covers! Shott
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: full, on off, and a bit of inswing on this occasion. Struck to mid off
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full, on off, and he prods forward to block
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: knuckle ball, full on middle, and dug away to the leg side
items.postText: Rashid : "Too many dot balls in powerplay might put them in pressure at the end. Good start though for Bangladesh. Need little exceleration. "
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length, wide outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, no run
